Buying the envelopes you can get from Duskruin.

Arena envelopes (a wrapped papyrus envelope): 5k silver per! Willing to pay in bloodscrip at 3 BS per if you would rather have that.

Sewer envelopes (a wrapped palimpsest envelope): 20k silver per! Willing to pay in bloodscrip at 12 BS per if you would rather have that.
